name: Poker World Mega Billions
description:
Plentiful and interesting game types and cool game interfaces will bring you tremendous fascination and gaming experience! Join us to enjoy the purest game environment with fair and open random licensing rules and massive amounts of free chips with abundant gifts!
Main Features:
● Massive amounts of free chips: You will own massive amounts of free chips here every four hours!
● Invite friends: You can invite your friends for an exciting Texas party. You'll meet many Texas players from all over the world!
● Glory rings and trophies: Win rings! Win a variety of tournaments and grab your own trophies!
● Colorful game modes: Here, novel game modes will be regularly launched, bringing you unprecedented game experience. Come and open the door to a new world!
● Game level setting: You will meet advanced players and learn advanced poker skills by improving your level. You will also obtain a higher reward rate and incentives.
● Facebook bonus: Connecting to your Facebook account, you'll get more free chips every day and numerous fans. The next poker superstar is you!
Looking forward to your participation, we are very pleased to receive your valuable opinion! Play poker with players around the world and obtain daily free chips!
This game is only for entertainment for adults (21+). It does not involve any gambling function. It does not offer real money gambling , nor to provide an opportunity to win real money or physical goods as well.
Any success in this game is not indicative of future success at real money gambling.
